name: Clueless Karim
description:
Clueless Karim is a point and click horror-action game developed for Snappy Gurus' Summer Jam 2022.

You must distract Karim from his daily tasks by interacting with objects in his house, such that doesn't run into the demon that lives there with him.

If Karim falls asleep soundly at midnight, you win. If Karim is possessed, well...

Good luck!

We didn't quite finish it, but we hope you enjoy!
